function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases in the construction industry","Impact":"High rates of sickness and infection, leading to project delays and reduced workforce","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety protocols, increased testing and monitoring","Technologies":"Health monitoring and testing technology, contact tracing technology","People":"Construction workers, project managers, site supervisors","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, government authorities"},{"Description":"Economic impact of business failures in the construction industry","Impact":"Negative impact on the entire economy due to chain reaction of business failures","Mitigation":"Financial support for struggling firms, strategic planning for business continuity","Technologies":"Economic forecasting and modeling tools, financial assistance platforms","People":"Construction firms, government authorities, financial institutions","Owner":"Government authorities, financial institutions, industry associations"},{"Description":"Unemployment and labor availability in the construction industry","Impact":"High levels of unemployment and workforce shortage, leading to project delays and reduced productivity","Mitigation":"Job creation initiatives, workforce training and upskilling programs","Technologies":"Online training platforms, job matching and resource allocation tools","People":"Unemployed construction workers, labor unions, workforce development agencies","Owner":"Government authorities, industry associations, construction companies"}]}
